{{Description|You studied the ripples in the water with Paimon.}}
'''Aquacrest Saber''' is [[Traveler (Hydro)]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When Torrent Surge DMG hits at least one [[enemy]], it generates '''3.333''' [[Elemental Particle]]s.
* When Suffusion is active and used throughout the entire duration of the Hold Mode, a total of '''24%''' Max HP will be consumed.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|ascension|1|Spotless Waters|character=Traveler (Hydro)|talent=Aquacrest Saber}}
* {{Talent Note|ascension|2|Clear Waters|character=Traveler (Hydro)|talent=Aquacrest Saber}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|3|Turbulent Ripples}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Pouring Descent}}
